tasks: {"sum_instruction": "Gliding forward beneath the soft glow of daylight filtering through green blinds, let the striped rug and a cloud-white sofa drift to your left. You'll arrive at a cozy wooden bench resting beneath the window—this is where your journey pauses.", "sum_indexes": [0, 51]}
